content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"What is the Process Approach\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"The process approach includes establishing the organization’s processes to operate as an integrated and complete system - QMS.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"According to ISO 9001, each activity can be presented as a process. Process is a set of interrelated or interacting activities that use inputs to deliver an intended result - output.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/80cf2e57-b07a-4dbe-a893-5b74542919b1/Han.png\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":423,\"height\":235},\"align\":\"align-center\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"For example, product development: requirements are the input, the build is the output; requirements development: the customer’s needs are the input, complete requirement specifications are the output. All processes are interconnected: they cooperate with one another, i.e. the result (output) of one process is another one’s input.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/1a11ea52-2680-41aa-a903-c7fef6712c17/ProcessScheme.png\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":445,\"height\":194},\"align\":\"align-center\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\nA successful process requires resources (people, tools, an environment, methodical materials, etc.), clearly defined roles and responsibilities within the process, and evaluation of the efficiency of the process (for more details see our \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://epam.sharepoint.com/sites/policy/SitePages/Policy/Parent Pages/Regulations and Deviation/Change Management\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" – it's about the project environment, how a is used in a particular project and some of these processes may be excluded.
